name: Cool Dragon
description: Cool Dragon is literally extremely cool dragon in extremely neon-crazy world. Drag boxes with a drink, drive a motorcycle and teleport on the location to complete this bloody level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space
